original_title: The Haunted Boy: The Secret Diary of the Exorcist
overview: This is the untold story of The Exorcist, a chronicle of true events based on the priest's secret diary the world was not to see.
tagline: This is the untold story of The Exorcist, a chronicle of true events based on the priest's secret diary the world was not to see.
title: The Haunted Boy: The Secret Diary of the Exorcist
